text: Rose hips are the fruit of the rose plant. They can be eaten (with caution, the rose hip contains irritant hairs) and have a lot of Vitamin C. They are usually red/orange but may be dark purple to black in some species. Rose hips are commonly used as an herbal tea. == Other websites == * Rose hip recipes * BBC News: Rose-hip 'remedy' for arthritis * Rose hip recipes 2 Category:Fruits Category:Roses
title: Rose hip
